summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the Personnel Department to purchase, lease or obtain a license to use software for the City's Dependent Care Assistance Plan and to amend the current contract with William M. Mercer, Inc. to include deferred compensation consultant services; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1992 Budget of the Personnel Department for the purchase of software and consultant services; making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
